name: Gothenburg 2026 - Median Income
description: Single person earning SEK 410,000 in Gothenburg

sources.description: Based on Swedish Tax Agency 2026 rates: Gothenburg municipal tax 32.60%, grundavdrag SEK 17,400
sources.notes: Taxable: 410,000 - 17,400 = 392,600. Municipal tax: 392,600 Ã— 32.60% = 127,988. State tax: 0. Work credit: 0 (simplified model). Net tax: 127,988. Net: 282,012. Effective rate: 31.22%. Note: Gothenburg tax rate increased significantly from 31.50% (2025) to 32.60% (2026).
